âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Live validation via cloud-provider APIs â€¢ Supports scanning GitLab repos, S3 buckets, Docker images, Jira issues, and Slack messages â€¢ Supports extracting and scanning compressed files for secrets â€¢ Baseline mode to ignore known secrets and flag only new ones â€¢ Language-aware detection for ~20 languages
ðŸ“– Summary: Kingfisher is a blazingly fast secret-scanning and validation tool built in Rust. It leverages Hyperscan and Tree-Sitter for performance and language-aware parsing. Kingfisher offers live validation, supports various targets like Git repositories, S3 buckets, and Docker images, and includes baseline management to ignore known secrets.
